item.title: Biryani (Layman)
item.description: Oil Root Spices (clover, cinnamon sticks, cardamom, cumin seeds, Bay leaf, Mint leaves, etc.) Powdered Spices (Turmeric, Biryani Masala, Red Chili Powder) Salt to Taste Onions Ginger Garlic Vegetables Carrots Peas Cauliflower Potatoes Green Chillis Jalopenos Green/Red Bell Peppers Green Beans Rice After Cooking, Add Green Fresh Cilantro

item.title: Fried Rice
item.description: Rice 6 cup cooked Onions 3 medium Green onions 4 sticks Garlic 3 table spoons Ginger 1 table spoons Small akount of carrots and peas Lots of mushrooms Bean sprouts Lots of soy sauce 6-7 table spoons 4-6 table spoons

item.title: Manchurian Sauce
item.description: Oil Garlic Green chili Onion Mix Water Corn starch Soy sauce salt to taste Chili sauce Vinegar little 1/2 tea spoon Add a 1 cup of water Green chili Boil it Add Manchurian, pasta, spaghetti, etc
